Articles.Content: When you attach a stack-decoupler to the stock heat-shield you get this awful looking fairing to cover the sides of the heat-shield. Anybody feel up to trying to re-texture or maybe even remodel the thing? I cannot stand it any longer.

[Ven's Stock Revamp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92764-1-0-2-Stock-Part-Revamp-Update-1-8-1!) revamps the heatshield (along with most other stock parts) and also gives it and its fairing a better texture and the fairing model is completely flush with the other tanks. I guess you can delete all the parts except the heatshields if you don't want your other parts to be changed.

> 
> [Ven's Stock Revamp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92764-1-0-2-Stock-Part-Revamp-Update-1-8-1!) revamps the heatshield (along with most other stock parts) and also gives it and its fairing a better texture and the fairing model is completely flush with the other tanks. I guess you can delete all the parts except the heatshields if you don't want your other parts to be changed.

Thank you! That is exactly what I needed!
